Join us for a session on using Pandoc. Pandoc is a great tool for reformatting text. It allows you to create LaTeX, slide shows, html, and much more from simple markdown.

This session will be from 6:00-7:30 in the Estin Room (labeled interlibrary loan on this map). Which is on the 3rd floor of Mugar library.

Sign in on the Etherpad to register
